code: import React from'react';import{flatDeep,slugify,containsObject}from'../../../utils';import BlogListData from"../../../data/blog/BlogList.json";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SideCategories=function SideCategories(){var cats=BlogListData.map(function(item){return item.categories;});var singleCatArray=flatDeep(cats);var categories=[];singleCatArray.forEach(function(cat){var obj={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:1};var objIndex=containsObject(obj,categories);if(objIndex!==-1){var prevCount=categories[objIndex].count;categories[objIndex]={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:prevCount+1};}else{categories.push(obj);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"category-list ",children:categories.map(function(cat){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/category/".concat(cat.slug),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"left-content",children:cat.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"count-text",children:cat.count})]})},cat.slug);})});};export default SideCategories;
